name: denoland-plugins
description: Plugins for modern Deno development with Fresh, JSR, and Deno Deploy

plugins.name: denoland
plugins.description: Build modern Deno apps with Fresh, JSR, and Deno Deploy. Enforces best practices like using JSR over deprecated deno.land/x, includes Fresh/Preact/Tailwind patterns, Sandbox SDK guidance, and deployment workflows.
